page.title: 12Arrowcrest Nursery School.
page.content: { Arrowcrest First School Nursery unit is in Wirehill Drive, Redditch.It is run by Hereford and Worcester Education Authority.It is the latest Nursery to open in Redditch.Places are available to children not served by the town's two other nurseries.The unit offers 60 part -time places for children who are aged between three and five.There will be six members of staff from September 1985. In the meantime the staff are able to provide a happy,stimulating and caring environment in a modern unit which has a most pleasant view overlooking the Arrow Valley Park. { Demand for places outstrips supply and many{parents are now campaigning {for more facilities for the under {fives.
